amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide for a one percent across the board cut to the bill's discretionary spending levels.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 22 printed in House Report 114-639 to provide for a one percent across the board cut to the bill's discretionary spending levels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 241 (Roll no. 377).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
